messages.message: Hi, is there a reason why we now allow switching to OCR view in the DocWidget in build, but not in Converse?
We have not got any signal so far that this is a need in Converse. Do you have any scenarios where this would be helpful?

I think we should make the components the same across the different apps as much as makes sense. Today I needed to see if the OCR engine has found signatures and checkboxes within my input document.

It also seems weird that we move the lightbulb icon depending on which app youâ€™re in, is there a reason for that?

We will add the OCR view in Converse.

cc: @Natasha @alagu to explore if we can make the object detection icon positioning more consistent across Build and Converse.

the icons should be on the left for both converse and build (figma (https://www.figma.com/file/8beu0UxjJIW88ltlHpfB5M/%5BWIP%5D-Enterprise-User-Journeys-Part-3?type=design&node-id=557-40651&mode=design&t=6mdmzpsouc4pcisK-4)) @Aayush @Serena
